name: Cursetorn
description:
:
In all the years you practiced your craft, you've never seen a patient like this. Do your best to keep them and yourself alive in this resource-management / horror game!

Cursetorn is a small game made in one week for the "My First Game Jam 2020" by Necrosishead (Art / Music) & Pumamori (Programming / Sound Design).  While a story is written, the Game Jam version will only feature a (barely working) endless mode - we will however follow up on this project and complete it with a proper story mode. Definitely follow us on social media if you'd like to be the first to know when a new version drops!

Necrosishead's Tumblr
Puma's Twitter

CONTENT WARNING:
Cursetorn is first and foremost a horror game. Please keep this in mind when deciding whether to play or not!

  • Body Horror
  • Foul Language
  • Flashing Images
  • Sudden Sounds
  • Sudden Movement
  • Loud Noises
  • Torture
  • Jumpscares
  • Tryptophobia
